titleStmt.title: The costlie vvhore A comicall historie, acted by the companie of the Revels.
Costly whore.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Augustine Mathewes, for William Sheares, and are to be sold at his shoppe in Brittaines Burse,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The costly whore.
A variant of the edition with imprint giving Hugh Perrie as the second publisher.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Some print faded and show-through; some pages stained.
